articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
						
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk in a compatriotic atmosphere with the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.

articles.title: CPRK Censures S. Korean Warmongers' PSI Exercises
articles.content:
CPRK Censures S. Korean Warmongers' PSI Exercises
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued information bulletin No. 966 on Friday lashing out at the south Korean warmongers for frantically staging the DPRK-targeted PSI exercises in the waters off Pusan on Oct. 13 and 14 with not only U.S. forces but the Japan Maritime "Self-Defense Force" involved.
					 The above-said extremely provocative exercises staged by the puppet forces were a declaration of an all-out confrontation against the DPRK and an extremely dangerous act of pushing the inter-Korean relations to the brink of war, the bulletin said, and went on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities have staged exercises for a war of aggression against the DPRK almost every day and held sinister military confabs for mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK at a time when the inter-Korean dialogue started for the solution of the Red Cross humanitarian issues and the preparations for the reunion of separated families and relatives are making progress thanks to the positive and sincere efforts made by the DPRK.
					
					 This clearly indicates that they are only keen on escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen and realizing their ambition to invade the DPRK in utter disregard of dialogue, inter-Korean relations and peace.
					
					 The provocative war racket of the puppet group is nothing but the last-ditch efforts of those thrown into the abyss of ruin for their sycophancy and treachery and unpopular rule. 
					
					 It is a fantastic pipe dream for the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group to expect what they called "contingency" to take place and call for the implementation of "a plan for coping with it".
					
					 The DPRK stands for dialogue and peace but if the aggressors impose a war upon it, it will wipe them out to the last man and blow up their strongholds.

articles.title: N. Side Head of Military Talks Sends Protest Notice to S. Side
articles.content:
N. Side Head of Military Talks Sends Protest Notice to S. Side
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The KPA side at the north-south military working talks made on September 30 denounced the anti-DPRK confrontation fanatics for their wicked provocations, strongly demanding the south side severely punish the chief culprits and take responsible measures against the recurrence of similar provocations.
					 The south Korean puppet military authorities, however, have become all the more reckless in escalating the confrontation with the DPRK, defying the constructive demands made by the DPRK, prompted by its desire to defuse the present tension and achieve peace and prosperity common to the nation. This is an act of swimming against the trend of the times.
					
					 In this connection, the head of the DPRK side to the north-south general-level military talks sent the following protest notice to the south side military authorities Friday:
					
					 The minister of Defense of the south side in his public appearance disclosed plans to distribute frequency-modulated radios to be used for anti-DPRK psychological broadcasting and set up large electronic displays.
					
					 He even raised the issue of starting anti-DPRK loud-speaker broadcasting, groundlessly talking about provocations by someone.
					
					 The anti-DPRK psychological operations openly cried out for by the defense chief of the south side are an undisguised declaration of a war against the DPRK and another unpardonable and serious military provocation to it.
					
					 It does not want to see tension escalating but will never remain an on-looker to any war action or the slightest provocation threatening peace.
					
					 If the south side does not halt the above-said broadcasting and the scattering of anti-DPRK leaflets, it will never be able to escape the KPA's physical strikes at the broadcasting means and leaflet-scattering centers. 
					
					 The DPRK warns once again that its army will choose its mode of counteraction depending on the attitude of the south side.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces should clearly understand that there is no limit to this mode of counteraction.

articles.title: Chinese DM on Relations between Armies of China-DPRK
articles.content:
Chinese DM on Relations between Armies of China-DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Col. General Liang Guanglie, state councilor and defense minister of China, Thursday met and had a talk with the friendly visiting group of the Korean People's Army headed by Pyon In Son, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, at the August 1 Building in Beijing.
					 On the occasion Liang recalled that he was honored to have an audience with Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il when visiting the DPRK last year.
					
					 China and the DPRK are friendly neighbors sharing rivers and mountains, he said, and went on:
					
					 The traditional Sino-DPRK friendship is one provided and developed by Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, and Chinese revolutionaries of elder generation.
					
					 Recently the bilateral relations have developed on better terms.
					
					 Kim Jong Il visited China twice this year and high-level visits increased.
					
					 The development of relationship between the two armies is making great contribution to the strengthening of the Sino-DPRK friendly relations.
					
					 We will strive to consolidate and develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the two armies.

articles.title: Gabonese President on Will to Boost Cooperative Relations
articles.content:
Gabonese President on Will to Boost Cooperative Relations
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Ri Myong Chol, DPRK ambassador to Gabon, presented his credentials to Ali Bongo Ondimba, president of Gabon, on Oct. 6.
					Congratulating General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea at its Conference, the Gabonese president said he was pleased that everything is going on well in the DPRK and wished the Korean people steady successes and progress.
					
					 He reiterated his will to positively cooperate with the DPRK in the efforts to boost the bilateral friendly and cooperative relations.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassies
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassies
						
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Political parties, government ministries, organizations and figures from all walks life in different countries sent floral baskets to the DPRK embassies in their countries from Oct. 4 to 8 in celebration of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Among them were the People's Party of Cambodia, the Union Solidarity and Development Party, Union of Myanmar, the Party for Unity and Progress of Guinea, the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist), the Foreign Ministry of Iran and the Islamic Revolutionary Proletarian Organization of Iran, the Iranian Workers' House, the International Taekwon-Do Association in Iran, the Command-in-Chief of the Iranian Armed Forces, the deputy general secretary of Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party, the Syrian vice-president, the regional deputy secretary of the Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party and the director of the Organizational Department of the Regional Leadership of the party, the minister of National Defence of Syria, the chief of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Syria, the president of the Syrian Trade Unions Federation, the chairman of the General Union of Syrian Peasants, the vice-chairman of the National Democratic Party of Egypt, the chairman of the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association and the head of the Cairo Office of the Sudanese National Congress Party.

articles.title: Pyongyang University of Dance Rebuilt
articles.content:
Pyongyang University of Dance Rebuilt
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The reconstruction of Pyongyang University of Dance was completed with due ceremony on Friday.
					 The university where formative and artistic representation was successfully made in architecture has the main buildings, a dance theater, rooms for physical exercises, a dormitory and other facilities for education.
					
					 Present at the inaugural ceremony were Kim Ki Nam and Choe Thae Bok, secretaries of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Jin, chairman of the Education Commission, An Tong Chun, minister of Culture, officials concerned, builders and teachers and students of the university.
					
					 Kim Yong Jin made an inaugural speech.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants looked round the university.

articles.title: National Sports Festival Opens
articles.content:
National Sports Festival Opens
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The national sports festival celebrating the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea was opened with due ceremony at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street on Friday.
					 The participants in the festival will compete in 40 events including football, basketball, table tennis, shooting and rhythmic gymnastics to be held in Pyongyang, Hamhung, Wonsan, etc.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Ri Yong Su, department director of the Central Committee of the WPK, officials concerned and sportspersons.
					
					 Pak Myong Chol, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, made an opening speech.

articles.title: New Book Off Press
articles.content:
New Book Off Press
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- A collection of long true stories "Kimilsungia and the World" was recently brought out in the DPRK.
					The book deals with the background against which the flower of the sun carrying the august name of a peerlessly great man came into being for the first time in human history and the fact that the immortal flower is now in full bloom worldwide thanks to the meticulous guidance and care shown by General Secretary Kim Jong Il and sincerity of the Korean people and the world progressives.
					
					 The book has titles "Love for Flower," "Birth of Kimilsungia," "Boundless Reverence," "On the Occasion of Day of Sun", "Flower of Sun in Full Bloom All over the World," etc. The book introduces Kimilsungia which came into being as a symbol of progressive mankind's boundless praise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 Recalling that Indonesian President Sukarno presented Kim Il Sung with newly bred beautiful and rare flower after naming it Kimilsungia during his visit to Indonesia in April Juche 54 (1965), the book says this is an indication of world prominent figures and other people's profound reverence for him.
					
					 The book also tells the touching story about how Kim Jong Il made sure that the flower, which could hardly be found due to the turbulent situation in Indonesia, was traced and struck its roots in the DPRK.
					
					 Also given in the book are data showing the profound reverence for the great man manifested by the world people in cultivating the flower of the sun.

articles.title: DPRK Advances to Finals of Asian Soccer Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Advances to Finals of Asian Soccer Championship
						
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK men footballers made headway to the finals of the 2010 Asian U-19 Soccer Championship under way in China by defeating the south Korean rival 2-0 in the semifinals.
					 Earlier, the DPRK beat Iraq 3-0, Bahrain 2-0 and China 2-0 to advance to the semifinals, thus getting qualified for the 2011 U-20 World Cup.
					
					 In the semifinals on Oct. 14 the DPRK took on south Korea, which defeated Japan. In the match it scored the first goal in the 45th minute and the second in the 79th.
					
					 The DPRK team is to have the gold-medal game with the Australian rival on Sunday.

articles.title: Potato Glucoalkaloid Manufactured
articles.content:
Potato Glucoalkaloid Manufactured
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The O-Il Pharmaceutical Factory has recently succeeded in extracting glucoalkaloid from potato waste, the purity of which is over 95 percent.
					 The substance helps enhance the function of bone marrow in human body, increase such immunocyte as lymph cell susceptible to radiation, prevent blood cell from poisoning and neutralize all sorts of toxication.
					
					 It also raises the DNA and RNA contents reduced in blood and marrow cells, protects normal cells and constrains abnormal cells.
					
					 Kim In Ae, a 46-year-old woman who is one of the developers, told KCNA that they could get a better knowledge of available ingredients of potato through the manufacture of glucoalkaloid.
					
					 The factory has used glucoalkaloid in manufacturing various kinds of health foodstuffs and medicines strong in cardiac, anti-cancer and sterilizing action and efficacious for recovering from radiation harms and preventing and treating such diseases as diabetes, gastritis and skin diseases.
					
					 The medicines have proved good for hyperlipemia and leucopenia patients.

articles.title: Eternal Lifeline of Korean Revolution
articles.content:
Eternal Lifeline of Korean Revolution
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The 84th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU) is coming nearer in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The tradition of the DIU, provided by President Kim Il Sung, is the origin of the Korean revolution, a glorious symbol of its history and the lifeline of Songun Korea.
					
					 The President, who started revolutionary activities in his early years, organized the DIU, a new vanguard of the Korean revolution, on October 17 Juche 15 (1926).
					
					 The formation of the DIU was a starting point of the founding of a Juche-typed revolutionary party, its anti-imperialist fighting spirit constituted a basis of Songun politics and its program for socialist construction became the fundamental ideal of the revolution.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea, carrying forward the DIU tradition, has set a splendid model in accomplishing the cause of the popular masses' independence and the cause of socialism through a protracted and arduous revolution.
					
					 The President, who inherited two pistols from his father along with far-reaching aims of the revolution, prepared young people as core members of an armed unit-to-be under the banner of the DIU and provided a true model in building revolutionary armed forces, deeply aware that the revolution should be carried on with arms. 
					
					 The formation of the DIU also put an end to the distress-torn history of factional strife and split-up and ushered in a new history of single-mined unity. This feat of the DIU served as a precious treasure for completing the revolutionary cause of Juche and a basic source of Korean socialism's great viability.
					
					 The DIU tradition has been carried forward successfully by leader Kim Jong Il through generations and centuries.

articles.title: S. Korean  Minister of Unification's Reckless Remarks Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean  Minister of Unification's Reckless Remarks Blasted
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Hyon In Thaek, minister of unification of south Korea, on October 8 let loose such strange remarks as "south Korea stands for peaceful unification", "its process should be kicked off with changes in the north" and the like. He asserted "a fundamental change in the north's attitude" during the inspection of state administration at the south Korean "National Assembly" on October 5. He touted "asymmetric reciprocity," talking about what he called "experience" gained by Germany in its "reunification" during his trip to it. 
					 Minju Joson Friday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 Lurking behind his outpourings is a sinister intention to lead the DPRK to changes and achieve the unification through absorption just as Germans did.
					
					 "Experience gained in achieving reunification" and "asymmetric reciprocity" touted by Hyon only betrayed his ignorance as he lacked even elementary common sense. 
					
					 Both Korea and Germany differ from each other in the cause of their partition and they have covered quite different paths since their division. 
					
					 Hyon more often than not styles himself an expert on international issues. As minister of unification he should know better about the DPRK, the dialogue partner on unification, than about any other countries. It is deplorable that he is now busy letting loose only anti-reunification remarks quite contrary to the public mind-set desirous of national reconciliation and unity and improved inter-Korean relations, unaware of even the reality of the DPRK. 
					
					 These reckless remarks of Hyon are only adding to his crimes. It is quite clear what fate such traitors to the nation as Hyon will meet, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: Conclusion of FTA Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Conclusion of FTA Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of the All-People Movement for Checking the Conclusion of the South Korea-U.S. Free Trade Agreement in south Korea at a press conference held on Oct. 6 urged the puppet authorities to stop at once the moves to conclude the FTA as it would bring deterioration of people's living.
					 A press release read out at the conference accused the Lee Myung Bak regime of resorting to the moves to conclude the FTA while talking about "expansion of economic territory."
					
					 It termed this an act of threatening the existence of the south Koreans and driving the sluggish south Korean economy into a serious bankruptcy.
					
					 The moves stepped up by the "government" to conclude the FTA in utter disregard of the will of the south Koreans would worsen the economic imbalance and cut down jobs, leading to an economic crisis and deteriorated people's living, it said, demanding the Lee regime stop at once all the negotiations for concluding the FTA under the signboard of "globalization."

articles.title: Scrapping of US-S. Korea Alliance for Aggression Demanded
articles.content:
Scrapping of US-S. Korea Alliance for Aggression Demanded
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea at a press conference held in front of the puppet Ministry of Defense on Oct. 11 denounced the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its moves to tighten the alliance for aggression with the U.S.
					 At the conference the organization accused the south Korean and U.S military authorities of adopting a "strategic alliance 2015", "strategic guidelines for the development of new operational plan" and "guidelines for defense cooperation" at the annual security consultative meeting held in Washington on Oct. 8.
					
					 The organization disclosed the fact that through this the U.S. and the south Korean authorities seek to expand and intensify the joint military exercises targeted against the DPRK, round off a detailed scenario for military operations against it in peacetime and strengthen the posture to mount a preemptive nuclear attack and realize a triangular military alliance involving the U.S., south Korea and Japan, etc. 
					
					 The recent agreement is little short of boosting the alliance for aggression as it was a revision of the south Korea-U.S. "mutual defense treaty" whose coverage was limited to the Korean Peninsula, it held.
					
					 Bitterly blasting the bellicose forces' attempt to perpetuate the alliance for aggression, the organization strongly demanded the U.S. and the south Korean authorities opt for disorganizing the alliance.

articles.title: Lee Regime Urged to come out to Implement Joint Declarations
articles.content:
Lee Regime Urged to Come out to Implement Joint Declarations
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration made public a statement on Oct. 4 on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration.
					 The statement said that the declaration serves as a programme for bringing earlier the peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula by implementing the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 It accused the Lee Myung Bak regime in south Korea of totally denying the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration after bringing to naught all the successes made in the movement for reunification in the past since it came to power and taking the lead in the moves to tighten the sanctions against the DPRK in collusion with foreign forces.
					
					 It strongly demanded that the Lee regime halt at once its moves to escalate confrontation with the DPRK in conspiracy with its U.S. and Japan masters and come out to implement the inter-Korean declarations.
					
					 Should the Lee group of traitors persistently pursue the policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen in violation of the June 15 joint declaration, a milestone for reunification, and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it, the group will not be able to escape stern punishment of the nation, the statement warned.

articles.title: DR Congo Party Delegation Visits DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
DR Congo Party Delegation Visits DPRK Embassy
Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democratic Republic of Congo visited the DPRK embassy in that country on Oct. 9 congratulating General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and on its 65th birthday.
					 The delegation laid bouquets before the full-length painting of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before paying tribute to them.
					
					 On behalf of the National Executive Committee of the party the national executive secretary in charge of mobilization and propaganda of the party extended warm congratulations to Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the WPK and on its 65th birthday.
					
					 The secretary said that his party highly praises the WPK for having covered a road of shining victory and glory, meeting all challenges under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il over the past 65 years.
					
					 He expressed full support and solidarity with the WPK and the Korean people in their just cause of the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and reaffirmed the stand to boost the friendly and cooperative relations with the WPK.

articles.title: Egyptian Party Celebrates Anniversary of WPK
articles.content:
Egyptian Party Celebrates Anniversary of WPK
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The Arab Socialist Party of Egypt released a statement on Oct. 7 to mark the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The 65 year-long history of the WPK is a history of victory and glory in which it has led the people to work epochal changes, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea has built in Korea a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence by guiding the people to victory under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, founder of the WPK, and Kim Jong Il and made immortal contributions to the cause of global independence.
					
					 The Conference of the WPK, held on Sept. 28, reelected Kim Jong Il its general secretary and demonstrated its unshakable will to accomplish the socialist cause under his leadership.
					
					 The Arab Socialist Party of Egypt warmly congratulates the WPK Conference on its success and wishes the WPK headed by Kim Jong Il greater success in its struggle.
					
					 The Arab Socialist Party of Egypt expresses full support and solidarity with the WPK and the Korean people in their efforts to build a thriving nation and realize the country's reunification.

articles.title: Peruvian Party Congratulates Kim Jong Il's Reelection
articles.content:
Peruvian Party Congratulates Kim Jong Il's Reelection
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru issued a statement on Oct. 5 congratulating General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru extends warm congratulations to respected Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea at the recent WPK Conference and its successful holding. 
					
					 His reelection to the top post of the WPK represents the absolute support and trust of all the party members and people in him as he has strengthened and developed it into an experienced and tested party for nearly half a century.
					
					 The WPK Conference marked a historic event of landmark significance in carving out the future of socialist Korea and ensuring progress in the socialist cause.
					
					 Not only we but also the rest of the world people are convinced that socialism in the DPRK will never be frustrated but continue to make progress only in their van.

articles.title: Proposal for Founding DFRK Supported
articles.content:
Proposal for Founding DFRK Supported
						
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea and the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association made public a joint statement on Oct. 5 on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
					 The statement noted that the proposal correctly reflects the nature of the issue of Korea's reunification and the specific reality of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, the top leader of the DPRK, provided a fresh milestone for Korea's reunification by making sure that the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration was adopted, it said.
					
					 It is the firm belief of the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea and the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association that the proposal for founding the DFRK advanced by President Kim Il Sung would be surely materialized through the implementation of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, the statement concluded.

articles.title: Anniversary of WPK Commemorated
articles.content:
Anniversary of WPK Commemorated
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held in Russia, Ethiopia and Uganda and by the Secretariat of the Pan-African Movement on Oct. 6 and 7 in celebration of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 65th birthday.
					 Displayed in their venues were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and books introducing their immortal exploits.
					
					 The chairman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia said that Kim Jong Il set a grandiose goal for opening the gate to a thriving nation in 2012 marking the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung and is leading the Korean people in the efforts to hit the goal.
					
					 The secretary general of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea said that Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the WPK represented the absolute support and confidence of all the party members and other Korean people in him and reflected the steadfast faith and will to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche started by the President under his leadership.
					
					 The executive assistant to the general secretary of the Pan-African Movement praised Kim Jong Il as the prominent leader enjoying the absolute support and trust from all the people.
					
					 Meanwhile, meetings took place in Bulgaria, South Africa and Romania on Oct. 3 and 6 to celebrate the 65th anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the events in Russia, Ethiopia, Bulgaria and South Africa.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Indonesia
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was brought out in pamphlet by the Hekadaha Printing and Publishing House of Indonesia on Oct. 7.
					 The work, published on Oct. 2, Juche 84 (1995), is an immortal programme for party building and activities as it reviews with high pride the glorious history of the Workers' Party of Korea which carved out a new path for building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and indicates the way for developing the WPK into the eternal party of the President.

articles.title: Jefe de delegacion militar del Norte envia aviso a la parte Sur
articles.content:
Jefe de delegacion militar del Norte envia aviso a la parte Sur
						
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ATCC) -- En las conversaciones de expertos militares Norte-Sur de Corea, sostenidas el pasado 30 de septiembre, el Ejercito Popular de Corea denuncio las brutales provocaciones de los maniacos de confrontacion con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y exigio fuertemente que castiguen severamente a los autores principales y tomen las medidas responsables para prevenir la repeticion de tales casos. 
					Sin embargo, en desafio a la corriente de la epoca, las autoridades del ejercito titere surcoreano se muestran mas fanaticas por enfrentarse con la RPDC desoyendo la demanda constructiva de esta de acabar con la actual situacion tensa de la Peninsula Coreana y lograr la paz y la coprosperidad de la nacion.
					
					Al respecto, el jefe de la delegacion de la parte Norte a las conversaciones militares a nivel de general Norte-Sur de Corea envio el dia 15 a las autoridades militares surcoreanas el siguiente aviso de protesta:
					
					Hace poco, el ministro de Defensa de la parte Sur anuncio en una audiencia oficial los planes de lanzar las radios adaptadas a las frecuencias cambiadas de transmisiones radiales, que forman parte de la guerra psicologica contra el Norte, y de instalar las pantallas electronicas de gran tamano.
					
					Y se refirio hasta al reinicio de la radiodifusion  con altavoces contra el Norte hablando de la provocacion de alguien carente de pruebas.
					
					El hecho de que el ministro de Defensa, quien es jefe militar de la parte Sur, haya hablado directamente de la guerra psicologica contra la RPDC y urgio la ejecucion de ella, significa la abierta declaracion de guerra y otra imperdonable provocacion militar de gravedad contra la RPDC. 
					
					No deseamos la agravacion de la tension, pero no toleraremos jamas el acto belico ni una provocacion minima que amenace la paz.
					
					Si la parte Sur no suspende la transmision radial de guerra psicologica contra el Norte y el riego de volantes de contenido anti-RPDC, no podra evitar el ataque fisico de nuestro ejercito contra los medios radiales y los puntos desde donde se lanzan los volantes. 
					
					Volvemos a recordar que el modo de reaccion de nuestro ejercito dependera de la actitud de la parte Sur. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos deben conocer bien que las contramedidas de nuestro ejercito no tienen limites.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia ejercicio de guerra de belicistas surcoreanos
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia ejercicio de guerra de belicistas surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 15 la informacion no. 966 para denunciar los ejercicios de la "Iniciativa de Seguridad contra la Proliferacion" (PSI por siglas en ingles) que desarrollaron freneticamente los dias 13 y 14 los belicistas surcoreanos en el mar frente a Pusan introduciendo a las tropas norteamericanas y hasta las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" de Japon. 
					Este ejercicio belico de caracter provocativo es una declaracion de confrontacion total contra la RPDC y una locura muy peligrosa que lleva las relaciones intercoreanas al borde de guerra, senala la nota y continua:
					
					Justamente cuando gracias a los esfuerzos protagonicos y sinceros de la RPDC, se reiniciaron las conversaciones entre ambas partes coreanas para la solucion de los problemas humanitarios de la cruz roja y se promueven los preparativos para el encuentro de los familiares y parientes separados, las autoridades surcoreanas desarrollan diariamente los ejercicios belicos anti-RPDC y conspiran para asestar el ataque preventivo contra ella. 
					
					Este hecho deja en claro que ellas no estan interesadas en el dialogo ni en las relaciones intercoreanas ni en la paz, sino piensan unicamente en el enfrentamiento fratricida y la agresion al Norte de Corea.
					
					  La provocativa campana belica de la banda titere surcoreana no pasa de ser el ultimo coletazo de los que se encuentran en la crisis sin salida por su servilismo a las grandes potencias y sus infames politicas antipopulares. 
					
					  El supuesto "estado de emergencia" y el "plan frente a ello", de que hablan tanto EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos, son una ilusion tan ridicula que nunca se hara realidad. 
					
					   La RPDC desea el dialogo y la paz. Pero, si los agresores imponen la guerra, saldra sin vacilacion al encuentro de los agresores para exterminar a todos y destruir por completo el bastion de ellos.

articles.title: Minju Joson critica a Hyon In Thaek
articles.content:
Minju Joson critica a Hyon In Thaek
						
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ATCC) -- El pasado dia 8, el ministro de Reunificacion del Sur de Corea, Hyon In Thaek, chismeo que "desea la reunificacion pacifica" y "el comienzo de ella esta en el cambio del Norte".
					En la reunion de inspeccion de la administracion de la "Asamblea Nacional", sesionada el dia 5, tambien hablo del "cambio radical de la actitud del Norte". 
					
					Con anterioridad, durante su visita a Alemania, predico la "reciprocidad asimetrica" alabando las "experiencias de reunificacion" de ese pais europeo.
					
					Tales dichos parten de su siniestra intencion de lograr la reunificacion mediante la absorcion, como lo hizo Alemania, cambiando a la RPDC.
					
					Senala asi el rotativo Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido en su edicion de este viernes y prosigue:
					
					Las "experiencias de reunificacion" de Alemania, la "reciprocidad asimetrica" y otras palabras de Hyon son una expresion de su brutalidad. 
					
					Corea y Alemania fueron divididas por diferentes causas y recorrieron tambien diferentes trayectos desde la division. 
					
					Hyon, que se cree como especialista en los asuntos internacionales, debe conocer primero a la RPDC, contraparte de la reunificacion, porque es justamente el ministro de Reunificacion. 
					
					Sin embargo, el pronuncia palabras anti-reunificacion que contravienen a la opinion publica que desea la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion y la mejora de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas. 
					
					  Esta claro como sera el fin de ese traidor a la nacion que abulta su expediente criminal con tales palabras anti-reunificacion.

articles.title: Entidades extranjeras envian cestos de flores a embajadas coreanas
articles.content:
Entidades extranjeras envian cestos de flores a embajadas coreanas
						
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ATCC) -- En ocasion del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, muchas entidades y personalidades de varios paises enviaron del dia 4 al 8 los cestos de flores a las embajadas coreanas en los respectivos paises.
					Entre los remitentes figuran el Partido de Pueblo de Camboya, el Partido de Solidaridad y Desarrollo de la Union de Myanmar, el Partido por el Progreso y la Unidad de Guinea, el Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Gran Bretana (Marxista-Leninista), el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores, la Organizacion de Proletarios de la Revolucion Islamica, la "Casa de los Trabajadores", la Asociacion Internacional de Taekwondo, la Comandancia General del Ejercito, de Iran, el subsecretario general del Partido Socialista del Resurgimiento Arabe de Siria, el vicepresidente sirio, el subsecretario regional y el jefe del Departamento de Organizacion de la Direccion Regional de ese partido, el ministro de Defensa Nacional de Siria, el jefe del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito y Fuerzas Armadas de Siria, el presidente de la Federacion General de Sindicatos de Trabajadores de Siria, el presidente de la Union General de Campesinos Sirios, el vicepresidente del Partido Nacional Democrata de Egipto, el presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Egipto-Corea y el jefe de la Oficina de El Cairo del Partido Congreso Nacional Sudanes.
